footer.to-here-some-stopped: {total} users read this post. {stopped} did not read further
footer.to-here-none-stopped: {total} users read this post. Everybody read further

modal.title: Readers
modal.up-to-this-post: Users who read up to this post
modal.past-this-post: Users who read past this post
modal.to-the-end: Users who read to the end
modal.behind: Users who did not read to the end

permissions.heading: Who read
permissions.see-unread: See unread status of other users
permissions.mark-unread: Mark discussions as unread for own user

settings.title: Who read settings
settings.show-count-of-readers-who-stopped: Show the number of users who stopped reading instead of total read between posts
settings.hide-when-behind: Hide a user completely if they are behind that many posts
settings.max-visible: Maximum number of users to show before "read more"
settings.only-groups: Only show read status of users belonging to those groups
